description: A kidnapping gang led by Peterman that operates on Sabaody Archipelago, capturing people to sell to the Human Auctioning House.

keyMoments.title: Hound Pets Identified as Camie's Kidnappers
keyMoments.description: The Hound Pets, led by Peterman, are identified as the gang responsible for kidnapping Camie and delivering her to the auction house.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the criminal network that feeds the slave trade at Sabaody.

name.japanese: 人間オークション会場

description: A slave trading organization operating at Grove 1 of Sabaody Archipelago, backed by Donquixote Doflamingo. The organization auctions kidnapped humans and other species to the highest bidder, including World Nobles.

keyMoments.title: Human Auction Begins
keyMoments.description: The Human Auctioning House conducts its monthly slave auction with Disco as auctioneer, selling various kidnapped individuals including Camie.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the full scope of the slave trade operation at Sabaody and its connection to the World Government through the Celestial Dragons.
